name: The Descent 3D
description:
A remake of The Descent, originally made for the Spooky2D Jam 2022 game jam. This game was made as an entry to the UTSA 2023 RowdyHacks hackathon.

CONTROLS

Space to enter dialogue, E to cycle through

E to interact

WASD to move

Credits

Art by Abcde Martinez

Programming by Alex Bush and Fernando Ramirez
